activity.profileSetup: Welcome to PW Study Buddy! Profile setup complete.
dashboard.welcomeSubtitle: Ready to continue your learning journey? Let's make today productive!
dashboard.quickActionStudyDesc: Upload content and generate study materials
dashboard.quickActionQuizDesc: Test your knowledge with AI-generated quizzes
studyPage.title: AI Study Assistant
studyPage.subtitle: Choose your input method, provide content, select output language, and let AI generate your study package.
studyPage.topicNameLabel: Topic Name (Optional - AI will try to detect if empty)
studyPage.aiPromptPlaceholder: Enter a prompt for AI to generate text (e.g., Explain photosynthesis)
studyPage.aiGeneratedTextPlaceholder: AI generated text will appear here...
studyPage.noPWVideosFound: No Physics Wallah videos found for "{{searchTerm}}".
studyPage.dragDropOrBrowse: Drag and drop your file here or click to browse
studyPage.noVideosFoundSelection: No videos found for your selection.
loadingSteps.waitMessage: Please wait while we prepare your personalized study package...
studyMaterialResponse.aiTutorDisabledPla: Generate materials to enable AI Tutor.
studyMaterialResponse.aiTutorInitialTopi: Viewing materials for {{topic}} (in {{language}}). Ask me about this topic!
studyMaterialResponse.aiTutorInitialNewS: Hi! I'm your AI tutor for {{topic}} (in {{language}}). How can I help you learn better?
studyMaterialResponse.flashcardFlipPromp: Click card to flip. Card {{current}} of {{total}}
studyMaterialResponse.noFlashcards: No flashcards available for this topic.
studyMaterialResponse.noMindMap: Mind map not available for this topic.
studyMaterialResponse.noSummary: Summary not available for this topic.
studyMaterialResponse.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support the audio element.
studyMaterialResponse.audioLoadFailed: Audio could not be loaded. Please try again.
studyMaterialResponse.startQuizPrompt: Start the quiz to test your knowledge on {{topic}}.
studyMaterialResponse.shareModalSubtitle: Share this study material with others:
studyMaterialResponse.recommendationsSub: Based on your current study topic "{{topic}}", you might be interested in these PW Batches:
studyMaterialResponse.recommendationsNot: Note: These are general recommendations. Actual batch suitability may vary.
studyMaterialResponse.pdfEmbeddingRestri: Direct embedding for this PDF might be restricted.
studyMaterialResponse.pdfNotSupported: Your browser does not support PDFs. Please
studyMaterialResponse.noPreviewAvailable: No specific preview for this content type.
liveClasses.transcriptError: Could not load live transcripts. Retrying...
liveClasses.noTranscripts: No transcripts available yet for this stream.
liveClasses.noMcqAvailable: No new question available at the moment.
liveClasses.mcqSelectAnswerPrompt: Select an answer. New question in {{time}}s.
liveClasses.mcqNoQuestions: Quiz questions will appear here periodically.
liveClasses.leaderboardEmpty: Leaderboard is currently empty. Participate in quizzes to rank up!
myTopics.pageSubtitle: Explore all the subjects you've studied. Click on a topic to review your personalized materials.
myTopics.noTopicsCardSubtitle: Start studying by generating materials, and your topics will appear here!
myTopics.loginPromptSubtitle: Please log in to view your personalized study topics.
channelVideos.errorSubtitle: Could not load videos for this channel. Please try again later.
channelVideos.noVideosSubtitle: This channel might not have any videos yet, or there was an issue fetching them.
settingsModal.title: Settings
landing.heroTitle: Supercharge Your Studies with PW Study Buddy
landing.heroSubtitle: Generate personalized study materials, take interactive quizzes, battle friends, and learn from a vibrant community. Your ultimate academic companion is here!
landing.featuresSubtitle: Explore a suite of tools designed to make learning effective, engaging, and fun.
landing.feature1Desc: Instantly generate summaries, mind maps, flashcards, and more from any content.
landing.feature2Desc: Test your knowledge with AI-generated quizzes and get real-time feedback.
landing.feature3Desc: Challenge friends or AI in exciting quiz battles and climb the leaderboards.
landing.feature4Desc: Share notes, discuss topics, and learn collaboratively with peers.
landing.feature5Desc: Engage in live sessions with real-time transcription and AI doubt resolution.
landing.feature6Desc: Tailor your learning path based on your academic level and exam preferences.
landing.howItWorksSubtitle: Three simple steps to transform your study routine.
landing.step1Desc: Provide text, images, videos, or YouTube links you want to study.
landing.step2Desc: Our AI analyzes your content and generates a complete study package.
landing.step3Desc: Use interactive tools, quizzes, and community features to master your subjects.
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of students transforming their studies with PW Study Buddy.
